text: Kristýna Plíšková was the defending champion having won this tournament on the ITF Women's Circuit in 2013. However, she chose not to participate. Tereza Smitková won the title, defeating Kristina Mladenovic in the final, 7–6(7–4), 7–5. == Seeds == == Main draw == === Finals === === Top half === === Bottom half === == References == * Main draw * Qualifying draw Open Gdf Suez De Limoges - Singles
title: 2014 Open GDF Suez de Limoges – Singles
